Package org.hibernate.ogm.options.navigation.source.impl

This package provides different sources for option values.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OptionValueSource
    A source for option values.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationOptionValueSource
    An OptionValueSource which retrieves option values from Java annotations.
    ConfigurationOptionValueSource
    A OptionValueSource which provides access to options configured using a property in persistence.xml or similar.
    OptionValueSources
    Provides the list of OptionValueSources to be considered by default when creating an OptionsContextImpl.
    ProgrammaticOptionValueSource
    A OptionValueSource which provides access to options set via the programmatic option API.

Package org.hibernate.ogm.options.navigation.source.impl Description

This package provides different sources for option values. The current implementations provide access to options specified via (in order of descending priority):
  • fluent API invocations (on the global, entity and property level, see ProgrammaticOptionValueSource
  • via annotations (on the entity and property level, see AnnotationOptionValueSource
  • configuration properties in persistence.xml etc. (on the global level, see ConfigurationOptionValueSource
When retrieving the value of an option applying for a given element via OptionsService, all the sources are queried (following the precedence algorithm described in OptionsContext) and the value effectively applying for the element is cached.
Author:
Gunnar Morling
